title: Red Sox Owner Goes Car Shopping; New Fox Bets on NFL and Sports
itunes:title: Red Sox Owner Goes Car Shopping; New Fox Bets on NFL and Sports
description:
Eben Novy-Williams and Scott Soshnick discuss a host of issues related to the business of sports, including the Bloomberg News report that said Boston Red Sox owner John Henry is contemplating an investment in Nascar. Henry already owns half of Roush Fenway Racing. Also discussed is the strategy being employed by what's known as New Fox, which is charting a new course after a blockbuster deal with Walt Disney Co. New Fox is focusing on live TV, which stresses sports and news, including the NFL. Also talked about is the NCAA's looming court decision over the college sports governing body's possible antitrust violations. 

Hosts: Scott Soshnick and Eben Novy-Williams

Producer: Jessica Summers

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
